snippet.title: Boundless - Launch Date Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Coming to the PlayStation®4 on the 11th of September, 2018, Boundless is a player-driven sandbox MMO built on endless possibility. Open portals to travel seamlessly between diverse planets within a single universe as you build, craft, trade and fight to form a new civilization. Will you hunt rare, exotic creatures, or build a sprawling capital city? With limitless choices before you, you are free to make your own path.

Be Bold, Be Remarkable, Be Boundless. Pre-order now on PlayStation®Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP3887-CUSA07244_00-BOUNDLESSUS00000

Find out more on Twitter at @playboundless or Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/playboundless/

Copyright 2014-2018 Wonderstruck, Turbulenz Limited. All Rights Reserved.
